name: @rxdi/deploy
description: Package prepared to deploy easy decentralized rxdi package

scripts.postpublish: git push -f ssh://git@gitlab.youvolio.com:522/rxdi/deploy.git && git push --tags && git push ssh://git@gitlab.youvolio.com:522/rxdi/deploy.git --tags
scripts.deploy: docker run -v /proba/:/usr/src/app/proba --name rxdi-deployer rxdi/deployer ./proba/index.ts || true && npm run stop

author: Kristiyan Tachev
